title: Latvian Foreign Ministry invites development project applications
summary_full: Latvia's Foreign Ministry has announced a grant project competition for development cooperation in several specific countries for 2026, and invites all those interested to an informative seminar.
summary_public: Latvia's Foreign Ministry has announced a grant project competition for development cooperation in several specific countries for 2026, and invites all those interested to an informative seminar.

LV.label: positive
